import numpy as np

def build_coefficient_matrix(Cao, Csa, Rao, Rsa, dt):
 """
 è¿”å›ç»™å®šå‚æ•°ä¸‹çš„ 4x4 ç³»æ•°çŸ©é˜µ Aï¼Œ
 å½¢å¼ä¸º A @ [P_LV, P_SA, Q_SV, Q_SA]^T
 """
 A = np.array([
 [-1 / Rao, 0, 0, 0],
 [ 0, -1 / Rsa, 1, 0],
 [ 0, 0, 0, 1],
 [ 0, Csa / dt, 1, -1],
 ])
 return A

def build_rhs_vector(Qlv, Pao, Psv, Qao, Pao_1, Psa, Rao, Rsv, Cao, Csa, dt):
 """
 è¿”å›å³ç«¯å‘é‡ bï¼š
 [
 -Qlv - Pao / Rao,
 -Psv / Rsv,
 Qao - Cao/dt * (Pao_1 - Pao),
 Csa/dt * Psa
 ]
 """
 b1 = -Qlv - Pao / Rao
 b2 = -Psv / Rsv
 b3 = Qao - Cao * (Pao_1 - Pao) / dt
 b4 = Csa / dt * Psa

 return np.array([b1, b2, b3, b4])
